Muqit, Lars-Olof Hattenbach, Andrea Cusumano, Salvatore Grisanti, Laurent Kodjikian, Marco Andrea Pileri, Frederic Matonti, Eric Souied, Boris V. Stanzel, Peter Szurman, Michel Weber, Karl Ulrich Bartz-Schmidt, Nicole Eter, Marie Noelle Delyfer, Jean François Girmens, Koen A. van Overdam, Armin Wolf, Ralf Hornig, Martina Corazzol, Frank Brodie, Lisa Olmos de Koo, Daniel Palanker, José-Alain Sahel Journal: New England Journal of Medicine Veröffentlicht: 2026-01-15 DOI: 10.1056/nejmoa2501396 ISSN: 0028-4793 Tag der Erhebung (OOIR): 2026-01-21

item.title: Universal Base-Edited CAR7 T Cells for T-Cell Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia
item.description: Feld: Clinical Medicine Kategorie: Medicine, General & Internal Score: 1930 Autoren: Robert Chiesa, Christos Georgiadis, Hebatalla Rashed, Roland Preece, Prudence Hardefeldt, Jan Chu, Jemma Selvage, Avijeet Mishra, Batoul Ahmed, Stuart Adams, Rebecca Thomas, Kimberly Gilmour, Annie Etuk, Deborah Yallop, David O’Connor, Waseem Qasim Journal: New England Journal of Medicine Veröffentlicht: 2026-01-08 DOI: 10.1056/nejmoa2505478 ISSN: 0028-4793 Tag der Erhebung (OOIR): 2026-01-21

item.title: Clinical Trials Affected by Research Grant Terminations at the National Institutes of Health
item.description: Feld: Clinical Medicine Kategorie: Medicine, General & Internal Score: 1517 Autoren: Vishal R. Patel, Michael Liu, Anupam B. Jena Journal: JAMA Internal Medicine Veröffentlicht: 2026-01-01 Abstract: This cross-sectional study summarizes the number of trials with terminated grants from the National Institutes of Health (NIH) and calculates the proportion of affected trials among those with previously active NIH funding, by trial status at time of grant termination and by trial characteristics. DOI: 10.1001/jamainternmed.2025.6088 ISSN: 2168-6106 Tag der Erhebung (OOIR): 2026-01-21

item.title: Updated Labeling for Menopausal Hormone Therapy
item.description: Feld: Clinical Medicine Kategorie: Medicine, General & Internal Score: 1166 Autoren: Martin A. Makary, Christine P. Nguyen, Tracy Beth Høeg, George F. Tidmarsh Journal: JAMA Veröffentlicht: 2026-01-13 Abstract: This Viewpoint describes the US Food and Drug Administration’s intended label updates and removal of black box warnings for menopausal hormone therapy based on current evidence. DOI: 10.1001/jama.2025.22259 ISSN: 0098-7484 Tag der Erhebung (OOIR): 2026-01-21

item.title: Deaths potentially averted by small changes in physical activity and sedentary time: an individual participant data meta-analysis of prospective cohort studies
